array.string: 더 노력할 수록 큰 댓가가 돌아올 것입니다.
I like mom the most all over the world.
My younger brother is uglier than me.
My yougner brother is the best guy in the world.
The biggest island is a Jeju.
The second biggest island is Woolungdo.
Let's try harder a little more.
The harder you try, you will get bigger gain.
세상에서: in the world@@제일: the best
한국: Korea@@큰: big, large@@섬: a island@@제주도: Jeju
조그만:a little@@더: more@@ 힘냅시다: get more strength
더:more@@노력할 수록:when you try@@큰: big@@댓가: gain@@돌아올 것입니다: will come
